description: Logan is not a handyman and he can't figure out the problem with his sink. He calls up a Plumber to fix his problem and only has a twenty minute wait. Alessio shows up faster than any service out there and Logan is hyped his problem will be fixed. Alessio pulls out his snake and jams it down the sink to unclog the food which was stuck. The fee for the service is over $200 and he can't pay any of that. Alessio has a raging boner that just can't keep inside his overalls and he takes advantage of Logan's situation and lets him know that if he comes closer he will take care of everything. Logan is a smooth hefty built man who works out continuously and Alessio is a dark hairy built man who loves his men smooth and in need. These hunks take it to the extreme with some hard pounding positions and intense passion.  Enjoy!
title: Plumbing 101
